dev-hub.description: This development tool lets you create, design, and package Python OS apps.
dev-hub.author: Adam Furman
dev-hub.title: Dev Hub
dev-hub.name: dev-hub

state-shell.name: state-shell
state-shell.author: Adam Furman
state-shell.description: A debugging app. Allows access to the state variable.
state-shell.title: State Shell

calculator.name: calculator
calculator.author: Adam Furman
calculator.description:
A fully functional, multi-functional calculator.
 Performs basic operations
 Stores last answer
 Performs any root
 Supports long expressions using parentheses.
calculator.title: Calculator

sleep.name: sleep
sleep.author: Adam Furman
sleep.description: Provides a way to sleep the screen. Only works on an actual device.
sleep.title: Sleep

shutdown.name: shutdown
shutdown.author: Adam Furman
shutdown.description: Shut Down your Python OS device. Works on linux.
shutdown.title: Shut Down

home.name: home
home.author: Adam Furman
home.description: The Python OS homescreen. Contains a link to State Shell.
home.title: Home

todo.name: todo
todo.author: Adam Furman
todo.description: Make a to-do list and check items off.
todo.title: ToDo

post10forum.name: post10forum
post10forum.author: Adam Furman
post10forum.description: Post to and browse the 10 Post Forum. Designed by Adam Furman as a CS project. Old posts dissapear after 10 new ones.
post10forum.title: 10 Post

quit.name: quit
quit.author: Adam Furman
quit.description: Provides a simple way to quit Python OS.
quit.title: Quit

clock.name: clock
clock.author: Adam Furman
clock.description: A simple clock app. Displays the time and date, including seconds. Tap the time to change 24hr to 12hr format.
clock.title: Clock

pman.name: pman
pman.author: Adam Furman
pman.description: Explore, download, and update Python OS apps. The redesigned package manager features a new interface and powerful functionality.
pman.title: PMan

music-player.name: music-player
music-player.author: Adam Furman
music-player.description: Play music files. Add files to the playlist on the second page. Skip, play, pause and stop.
music-player.title: Music

task-manager.name: task-manager
task-manager.author: Adam Furman
task-manager.description: Access and control running applications. Use caution, this can potentially cause data loss.
task-manager.title: Tasks

editor.name: editor
editor.author: Adam Furman
editor.description: Creates and edits plain text format files.
editor.title: Editor

test.name: test
test.author: Adam Furman
test.description: This app is used to test the package manager. It performs no function.
test.title: Test

files.name: files
files.author: Adam Furman
files.description: A powerful file manager. Move, copy, delete, rename, and open files and folders. Create a new folder by long pressing the background.
files.title: Files

image-viewer.name: image-viewer
image-viewer.author: Adam Furman
image-viewer.description: Opens and views image files. Automatically resizes and rotates them for best fit to the screen.
image-viewer.title: Pictures

starforce.name: starforce
starforce.author: Adam Furman
starforce.description: A simple, fun space shooter with fluid animations. Adaptive difficulty and easy gameplay.
starforce.title: StarForce

dev-refresh.name: dev-refresh
dev-refresh.author: Adam Furman
dev-refresh.description: A developer tool to run the refresh.sh script.
dev-refresh.title: DevRefresh

stopwatch.name: stopwatch
stopwatch.author: Adam Furman
stopwatch.description: A fully-functional stopwatch. Stop, start, and count laps with 1/100sec precision.
stopwatch.title: Stopwatch

file-reader.name: file-reader
file-reader.author: Adam Furman
file-reader.description: Opens and reads plain text format files.
file-reader.title: Reader

gallery.name: gallery
gallery.author: Adam Furman
gallery.description: Browse and open pictures by folder.
gallery.title: Gallery

usb-mount.name: usb-mount
usb-mount.author: Adam Furman
usb-mount.description: Allows the mounting/unmounting of USB devices. Scans the /dev/ folder. Mounts to docs/USBX.
usb-mount.title: USB Mount

wolfram-alpha.name: wolfram-alpha
wolfram-alpha.author: Adam Furman
wolfram-alpha.description: Search for information using Wolfram|Alpha. Enter any query, and get meaningful results. Tap each image to open larger view.
wolfram-alpha.title: Alpha

launcher.name: launcher
launcher.author: Adam Furman
launcher.description: The standard application launcher. Apps highlighted in blue are running. Long click to uninstall.
launcher.title: Launcher

wifi.name: wifi
wifi.author: Adam Furman
wifi.description: Connect to wireless networks. Requires a wireless USB device. Supports WEP and WPA2 encryption through python-wifi.
wifi.title: WiFi

timer.name: timer
timer.author: Adam Furman
timer.description: A timer application. Set minutes and seconds. The timer continues even when the app is not active.
timer.title: Timer
